original_text: When you choose a king for yourselves, the Lord will send you and him away to a foreign country. It will be a place that neither you nor your ancestors have ever heard about. There you will serve gods that people have made from stone and wood.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너와 네가 세울 네 임금을 너와 네 조상들이 알지 못하던 나라로 끌어 가시리니 네가 거기서 목석으로 만든 다른 신들을 섬길 것이며

sentences.original_text: When you choose a king for yourselves
the Lord will send you and him away
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 너와 그를 멀리 보낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: that neither you nor your ancestors have ever heard about
sentences.korean_translation: 너도 너의 조상도 들어본 적이 없는

sentences.original_text: that people have made from stone and wood
